Account Id.description: The unique identifier of the account associated with the label.

Color.description: The color code or name associated with the label for visual identification purposes.

Client Id.description: The unique identifier of the client associated with the label.

Description.description: A brief description or notes related to the label.

Id.description: The unique identifier of the label.

Label.description: The name or title given to the label for identification.

Modified Time.description: The date and time when the label was last modified.

Status.description: The current status of the label, such as active, inactive, or archived.
